message: It would be good if sessions had a separate entry for the id of the session. At the moment I have to extract the id of the session from the end of the web_url. example http://sxsw-preview-api.lanyrd.net/2011/sxsw/mar-11/
Aah yes, sorry about that - the ID thing is a bit strange
at some point in the next few days they'll be changed in to IDs that start with an 's', at which point they'll correspond with session pages on the main http://lanyrd.com/ site
no it's ok. I'll just extract if from the web_url. thanks anyway.
The IDs the API is serving at the moment (that begin with an X) are actually just temporary IDs
I'll publish a mapping of old-ids-to-new-ids when that happens, in case anyone has keyed any data against the old ones
anything I can do with them in the meantime to make things easier?
